attributes.action: Stop calling disabled people in who has got pip for ten years
attributes.additional_details: Disabled people who have pip for ten years are not going to get better in heath or doing things the government have already said this as they class ten years as life
attributes.background: Stop calling people on pip who has it for ten years

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action: 

Stop DWP repeating PIP assessments for disabled people
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/703827
